document_data.mainbody:
lue Flagon was a type of ale concoction found in the fishing town of Tulmene on the Dragons Head Peninsula in Tethyr.
Blue Flagon was served at the Fast Sails tavern in Tulmene. It was more expensive than the taverns swirl â€“ Red Wyrm Ale. The Flagon was a dark nutty ale with an after taste that cleared up ones throat. Some called it almost minty.
